# description

**Instance Property**

A text representation of the data frame slice.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing a Slice

- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the data frame slice suitable for debugging.
- **customMirror**: A mirror that reflects the data frame slice.
